entities.name: deathday party
entities.description: The Deathday Party is mentioned as an event where hundreds of ghosts are present. The party is described as having a feast afterwards.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who is suspicious of Harry's excuse for leaving the party early. He has black eyes and a gaunt face.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who looks at him when Snape questions his excuse for leaving the party early.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who looks at him when Snape questions his excuse for leaving the party early.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who tries to come up with an excuse for leaving the Deathday Party early. He says he and his friends were tired and wanted to go to bed.

relationships.description: Snape is suspicious of Harry's excuse for leaving the party early. He suggests that Harry might not be telling the truth.
Ron loudly defends himself and his friends when Snape questions their excuse for leaving the party early.
